lead_paragraph: Russell Knox sank a 12-foot par putt at the final hole to win the Travelers Championship in Connecticut by one shot on Sunday, moving the Scot into contention for a place on the European team at next month's Ryder Cup.

headline.print_headline: Golf: Knox Knocking on Ryder Cup Door After Second Win
headline.main: Golf: Knox Knocking on Ryder Cup Door After Second Win

snippet: Russell Knox sank a 12-foot par putt at the final hole to win the Travelers Championship in Connecticut by one shot on Sunday, moving the Scot into contention for a place on the European team at next month's Ryder Cup....
